key.name:
Ten warriors take part in 1-on-1 battles until only one is left standing. The order of the matches is randomized.
<font color='#FFD200'>Required level: Lv. 50 Participants: 5 to 10</font>

Ten warriors battle each other for points, earning when they defeat an enemy and losing when they fall themselves. Whoever scores the most points in 5 minutes wins.
<font color='#FFD200'>Required level: Lv. 50 Participants: 5 to 10</font>

Two teams, red and blue, battle to capture the flag of the opposing team. Whoever gets the highest score wins.
<font color='#FFD200'>Required level: Lv. 50 Participants: 20 (10 per team)</font>
